blackengine.gameLogic.components.prefab.behaviour

Class BehaviourBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • blackengine.gameLogic.components.prefab.behaviour.BehaviourBuilder

  • public class BehaviourBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    An instance of this class can build a Behaviour with the provided parameters.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected BehaviourBuilder(java.lang.String name, java.util.function.Consumer<Entity> consumer)
      Default protected constructor for creating a new instance of BehaviourBuilder.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BehaviourBuilder after(long delay)
      Specify a delay for execution of the behaviours consumer.
      Behaviour build()
      Builds the behaviour given all previously called method parameters.
      BehaviourBuilder every(long interval)
      Specify an interval which will occur between executions of the behaviours consumer.
      BehaviourBuilder repeating(int times)
      Specify the times the behaviour should execute its consumer before flagging for destruction.
      BehaviourBuilder withPriority(float priority)
      Specify the priority of the behaviour that will be built.

        Default protected constructor for creating a new instance of BehaviourBuilder.

        consumer - The consumer of the behaviour when built.

    • Method Detail

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • every

      • repeating

        public BehaviourBuilder repeating(int times)
        Specify the times the behaviour should execute its consumer before flagging for destruction.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        this.

      • withPriority

        public BehaviourBuilder withPriority(float priority)
        Specify the priority of the behaviour that will be built. If not specified, the priority will be 1.0f.
        Parameters:
        priority - The priority that will be given to the behaviour when built.
        Returns:
        this.

      • build

        public Behaviour build()
        Builds the behaviour given all previously called method parameters.
        Returns:
        A new instance of Behaviour with the specification that was specified using the parameters in previously called builder methods.
